title: The Mad Woman in the Attic: Part 1
description: The second of two beautiful women is murdered on a train, and the primary suspect is an amnesiac man. A psychologist, Dr. Eddie "Fitz" Fitzgerald, an old friend of the second victim, is brought in to help.

title: The Mad Woman in the Attic: Part 2
description: As Fitz takes the amnesiac, Thomas Kelly, into his care to regain him his memory, doubts begin to sour about Kelly's guilt after an anonymous man claiming to be a priest commits the greatest sin ever: repeating a confession to the police.

title: To Say I Love You: Part 1
description: Sean Kerrigan and Tina Brien, two of society's rejects, are drawn together and will do anything to stay together forever, even murder. Fitz is drawn into the conflict when he begins to uncover the murder of Tina's loan shark.

title: To Say I Love You: Part 2
description: Sean and Tina target and kill DC George Giggs when he gets too close to the conflict, and an attempted hit on Fitz fails and results in Tina's arrest.

title: To Say I Love You: Part 3
description: Sean targets Tina's neglectful family and blind sister as an act of revenge as Fitz and the police close in on him.

title: One Day a Lemming Will Fly: Part 1
description: A young boy goes missing and is soon found dead in a wood, and Fitz is asked to join the investigation.

title: One Day a Lemming Will Fly: Part 2
description: Fitz duels it out with the prime suspect while an angry mob builds outside the police station.

title: To Be a Somebody: Part 1
description: A working class man, distraught at the recent death of his father, impulsively becomes a skinhead and murders a Pakistani shopkeeper over a perceived insult.

title: To Be a Somebody: Part 2
description: As Albie continues his merciless killing spree, Fitz is brought in to investigate, realizing that Albie is actually an ordinary citizen gone wrong, and the murder of DCI Bilborough tragically proves this.

title: To Be a Somebody: Part 3
description: Fitz and the police finally catch Albie, only to realize that he has a few explosive tricks in store for them.

title: The Big Crunch: Part 1
description: A charismatic cult preacher finds that he has impregnated one of his 16 year old students and must silence her to protect his position.

title: The Big Crunch: Part 2
description: Joanne Barnes dies in the hospital following her ordeal with the Trants, and one of Michael Trant's factory workers, Dean Saunders, is framed for the murder.

title: The Big Crunch: Part 3
description: Fitz remains unconvinced that Dean Saunders is the killer, and sets out to bring Kenneth Trant and his family to justice.

title: Men Should Weep: Part 1
description: A young black man, product of an interracial marriage, seethes with resentment and turns from being a serial rapist to murder.

title: Men Should Weep: Part 2
description: Floyd Malcolm, following apparent advice from Fitz, turns from serial rape to murder. At the same time, Penhaligon's rape puts a strain on her relationship with Fitz.

title: Men Should Weep: Part 3
description: Floyd Malcolm targets Fitz as the police close in on him, and Penhaligon discovers the true identity of her rapist.

title: Brotherly Love: Part 1
description: A married father of four, addicted to kinky sex with prostitutes, kills one when he cannot pay and she threatens to expose him to his wife.

title: Brotherly Love: Part 2
description: David Harvey is arrested, but while he is in custody, two more identical killings occur, casting doubt on his guilt. Jimmy Beck, meanwhile, cannot get over his guilt over Bilborough's death and raping Penhaligon.

title: Brotherly Love: Part 3
description: Maggie Harvey, David's wife, is discovered to be the second killer, but her confession to the first murder means David will be set free. Jimmy Beck finally reaches his breaking point and sets out to punish David otherwise.

title: Best Boys: Part 1
description: Stuart Grady, a lonely factory foreman, befriends a young male employee and the disturbed runaway involves them both in murder.

title: Best Boys: Part 2
description: Nash and Grady cross paths with Nash's former foster parents, which triggers Nash's long-harbored vendetta towards them, particularly their little boy. Still coping with Jimmy Beck's death, the police bring Fitz in to help catch Nash.

title: True Romance: Part 1
description: A lab technician, working at the same university as Fitz, begins to electrocute male students in order to gain the attention of the psychologist.

title: True Romance: Part 2
description: Fitz is taken off the case when it is discovered the killings are for him. Determined to catch Fitz's attention, Janice targets Mark.

title: White Ghost
description: A British businessman operating in Hong Kong has feelings of inferiority and turns to murder when he faces bankruptcy.
